co.cask.cdap.api.messaging

Interface Message


  • @Beta
public interface Message
    Represents a message in the messaging system.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getId()
      Returns the unique identifier of this message.
      byte[] getPayload()
      Returns the message payload.
      String getPayloadAsString()
      Returns the message payload as a UTF-8 string.
      String getPayloadAsString(Charset charset)
      Returns the message payload as a string decoded with the given Charset.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns the unique identifier of this message.

      • getPayloadAsString

        String getPayloadAsString(Charset charset)
        Returns the message payload as a string decoded with the given Charset.
        Parameters:
        charset - the Charset to use for decoding.
        Returns:
        the message payload as a string.

      • getPayloadAsString

        String getPayloadAsString()
        Returns the message payload as a UTF-8 string.
        Returns:
        a UTF-8 string representation of the message payload.

      • getPayload

        byte[] getPayload()
        Returns the message payload.
